name: The Belder Scrolls: Bad Combat Edition
name_original: The Belder Scrolls: Bad Combat Edition
description: I tried making an elder scrolls clone but the combat just sorta sucked. I think I'm gonna make it 2d as making 3d combat requires this thing called "good animation". With 2d I think I can get away with simpler animations. The menu and inventory systems are pretty good imo. Pretty simple and I loved adding in the World of Warcraft sound effects.
